did.abstract: Miscellaneous papers of E. D. Hampton, sheriff of Davidson county, including a letter, 1857, from Philip T. Hay, a student at the University of North Carolina, concerning one of his slaves who was in the Davidson county jail; letter, 1860, commenting on the presidential election; letters concerning land and business matters; and a handbill, 1868, advocating disenfranchisement of the Negro in North Carolina.
